AUTHOR: PookaMustard
INSTALL_MSG: Echo cog installed. Use [p]echo to repeat what you said, and [p]sonar to repeat what you said in the specified channel (throught the channel.id). Only the owner can use it.
NAME: Echo
SHORT: Repeats what you said where you want it, owner only.
DESCRIPTION: Repeats what you said where you want it, owner only, either in the current channel or in a specified channel. Credits to calebj for the original debug command.
